meanings.sent1: The variegated flowers in the garden brightened up the whole yard.
meanings.sent2: Her variegated scarf had stripes of blue, red, and yellow.
meanings.sent3: The variegated cupcakes looked like a rainbow had exploded in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The variegated sky at sunset resembled a painting by a master artist.
meanings.sent5: The variegated fish in the aquarium captivated the children's attention.

meanings.sent1: The variegated group of friends brought different perspectives to the discussion.
meanings.sent2: His variegated interests included painting, hiking, and cooking.
meanings.sent3: The variegated collection of books on her shelf made it hard to choose just one.
meanings.sent4: Her variegated personality was a mix of introverted and outgoing traits.
meanings.sent5: The variegated landscape of the countryside was a sight to behold.
